databaseModule

Class MongoManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • databaseModule.MongoManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DbFunctions, QueryFunctions

    public class MongoManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates cache of normalized server config files and data. Must have 'mongod' running simultaneously.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    ActianceEngInterns
